#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <utility>

using namespace std;

pair<size_t, size_t> dp[1001];

int main()
{
  size_t A[1111];
  size_t tt=0;
  scanf("%zd",&tt);
  while(tt--){
    size_t mm[1111];
    size_t ans = 1;
    size_t N;
    scanf("%zd",&N);
    for(size_t i=0;i<N;i++) {scanf("%zd",&dp[i].first);dp[i].second = 1;}
    for(size_t i=0;i<N;i++){
      for(size_t j=0;j<i;j++){
	if(dp[i].first >= dp[j].first && dp[i].second < dp[j].second+1){
	  dp[i].second = dp[j].second + 1;
	}
      }
      ans = max(ans,dp[i].second);
    }
    printf("%zd\n",ans);
  }
  return 0;
}
